list.abs: I've gazed upon three antlered deer ambling , two turkeys trotting , one red fox racing , a skunk skulking , a groundhog sunbathing , and bass swimming silently down a see through stream .我看见三只多叉鹿在溜蹄、两只火鸡快步走过、一头赤狐在奔跑、一只鼬鼠在躲躲闪闪、一只土拨鼠在享受日光浴，还有一尾鲈鱼在清澈的河流中静静地

but in an interview with Groundhog Day , he accidentally fell into a repeated one day in the time tunnel , when he woke up the next day , the same day : groundhog Day .不料他在采访土拨鼠节时意外陷入了不断重复某一天的时光隧道中，每当他第二天醒来，都是相同的一天：土拨鼠日。

entry.def: A groundhog is a type of small animal with reddish-brown fur that is found in North America.
